&group&handle&TYPE(MPI_Group)&in\\ [-3pt]
&\hbox to 0pt{\footnotesize\sl group, which is a subset of the group of comm\hss}\\
&tag&integer&INTEGER&in\\ [-3pt]
&\hbox to 0pt{\footnotesize\sl tag\hss}\\
&newcomm&handle*&TYPE(MPI_Comm)&out\\ [-3pt]
&\hbox to 0pt{\footnotesize\sl new communicator\hss}\\
(opt)&ierror&&INTEGER&out\\
)\\

&sendtype&handle&TYPE(MPI_Datatype)&in\\ [-3pt]
&\hbox to 0pt{\footnotesize\sl datatype of send buffer elements\hss}\\
&recvbuf&choice*&TYPE(*), DIMENSION(..)&out\\ [-3pt]
&\hbox to 0pt{\footnotesize\sl address of receive buffer\hss}\\
&recvcounts&const~non-negative integer[]&&in\\&\hbox to 0pt{\rmfamily length: \ttfamily\mdseries\catcode`\_=12 *\hss}\\ [-3pt]
&\hbox to 0pt{\footnotesize\sl non-negative integer array (of length group size) containing the number of elements that are received from each process\hss}\\
&displs&const~integer[]&&in\\&\hbox to 0pt{\rmfamily length: \ttfamily\mdseries\catcode`\_=12 *\hss}\\ [-3pt]
&\hbox to 0pt{\footnotesize\sl integer array (of length group size). Entry i specifies the displacement relative to recvbuf at which to place the incoming data from process i\hss}\\
&recvtype&handle&TYPE(MPI_Datatype)&in\\ [-3pt]
&\hbox to 0pt{\footnotesize\sl datatype of recv buffer elements\hss}\\
&root&integer&INTEGER&in\\ [-3pt]
&\hbox to 0pt{\footnotesize\sl rank of receiving process\hss}\\
&comm&handle&TYPE(MPI_Comm)&in\\ [-3pt]
&\hbox to 0pt{\footnotesize\sl communicator\hss}\\
&request&handle*&TYPE(MPI_Request)&out\\ [-3pt]
&\hbox to 0pt{\footnotesize\sl communication request\hss}\\
(opt)&ierror&&INTEGER&out\\

&\hbox to 0pt{\footnotesize\sl displacement from start of window to beginning of target buffer\hss}\\
&target_count&non-negative integer&&in\\ [-3pt]
&\hbox to 0pt{\footnotesize\sl number of entries in target buffer\hss}\\
&target_datatype&handle&TYPE(MPI_Datatype)&in\\ [-3pt]
&\hbox to 0pt{\footnotesize\sl datatype of each entry in target buffer\hss}\\
&op&handle&TYPE(MPI_Op)&in\\ [-3pt]
&\hbox to 0pt{\footnotesize\sl reduce operation\hss}\\
&win&handle&TYPE(MPI_Win)&in\\

&\hbox to 0pt{\footnotesize\sl send message tag\hss}\\
&source&integer&INTEGER&in\\ [-3pt]
&\hbox to 0pt{\footnotesize\sl rank of source or {\ttfamily\bfseries\catcode`\_=12 MPI_ANY_SOURCE}\hss}\\
&recvtag&integer&INTEGER&in\\ [-3pt]
&\hbox to 0pt{\footnotesize\sl receive message tag or {\ttfamily\bfseries\catcode`\_=12 MPI_ANY_TAG}\hss}\\
&comm&handle&TYPE(MPI_Comm)&in\\
&status&status*&TYPE(MPI_Status)&out\\
(opt)&ierror&&INTEGER&out\\
)\\
